8-year-old.context: The patient is an 8-year-old white female with chronic eustachian tube dysfunction and TM atelectasis, was taken to the operating room for tubes.

white female.context: The patient is an 8-year-old white female with chronic eustachian tube dysfunction and TM atelectasis, was taken to the operating room for tubes.

chronic eustachian tube dysfunction.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Tympanic membrane atelectasis and chronic eustachian tube dysfunction.

tympanic membrane atelectasis.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Tympanic membrane atelectasis and chronic eustachian tube dysfunction.

Bilateral myringotomies with insertion o.context: Operative Procedure: Bilateral myringotomies with insertion of Santa Barbara T-tube.

extruding right Santa Barbara T-tube.context: At the time of surgery, she has had an extruding right Santa Barbara T-tube and severe left TM atelectasis with retraction.

severe left TM atelectasis with retracti.context: At the time of surgery, she has had an extruding right Santa Barbara T-tube and severe left TM atelectasis with retraction.

scant amount of fluid in both middle ear.context: There was a scant amount of fluid in both middle ear clefts.

Cerumen was removed from the external ca.context: The right ear was draped in normal sterile fashion. Cerumen was removed from the external canal.

extruding Santa Barbara T-tube was ident.context: The extruding Santa Barbara T-tube was identified and atraumatically removed.

fresh Santa Barbara T-tube was atraumati.context: A fresh Santa Barbara T-tube was atraumatically inserted and Ciloxan drops applied.

severe TM atelectasis was identified.context: The attention was then directed to the left side where severe TM atelectasis was identified.

radial incision was made in the inferior.context: A radial incision was made in the inferior aspect of the tympanic membrane and middle ear fluid aspirated.

middle ear fluid aspirated.context: A radial incision was made in the inferior aspect of the tympanic membrane and middle ear fluid aspirated.

Santa Barbara T-tube was then inserted w.context: A Santa Barbara T-tube was then inserted without difficulty and 5 drops Ciloxan solution applied.

5 drops Ciloxan solution applied.context: A Santa Barbara T-tube was then inserted without difficulty and 5 drops Ciloxan solution applied.

anesthesia was then reversed.context: Anesthesia was then reversed and the patient taken to recovery room in satisfactory condition.
